title: AM0-HQ102-DPR AND DYRS HDQS
description: This project will fund the renovatation of surplus property for use as office space to house local government employees.  The acquisition and renovation of property is justified by the cost of savings generated by owning versus renting quality office space.  The scope will include, but will not be limited to the following:  Design and manage construction of office space; and acquire, construct or renovate buildings that meet space use specifications established by the District government.
